name: Iphone X
description: A premium smartphone featuring a sleek design, edge-to-edge display, advanced Face ID technology, powerful performance, and an impressive camera for capturing stunning photos and videos.

name: Realme 105G
description: A feature-packed 5G smartphone with a powerful processor, high-refresh-rate display, versatile quad-camera system, and long-lasting battery, delivering fast and immersive mobile experiences.

name: POCO F5
description: A flagship-grade smartphone offering exceptional performance, stunning AMOLED display, versatile camera system, long-lasting battery, and 5G connectivity for a premium mobile experience.

name: Boat Headphone X
description: Stylish and comfortable wireless headphones with immersive sound quality, long battery life, convenient controls, and a sleek design for an enjoyable and hassle-free audio experience.

name: Apple AirPods Pro
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, immersive sound, and a customizable fit.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4
description: Smartwatch with advanced health tracking, stylish design, and long battery life.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Premium over-ear headphones with industry-leading noise cancellation and high-resolution audio.

name: Canon EOS M50 Mark II
description: Mirrorless camera with 4K video recording, 24.1MP sensor, and versatile autofocus capabilities.

name: HP 14s Ryzen5
description: sleek and portable laptop with a 14-inch display, powerful performance, long battery life, and modern features for productivity on the go.
